attributes.action: Cancel the "Revoke Article 50 and remain in the EU." Petition
attributes.background:
17.4m voted leave.

Just because people didnt get what they want doesn't mean a petition should make a difference.

England didn't win the world cup can we do that again?

rejection.details:
We can't accept you're petition because we're not sure what action you'd like the Government or Parliament to take.

If you want to ensure Article is not revoked you might like to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/246387
